messageMail.subject: You got a Migree-mail from {0}
messageMail.message:
{0}

Reply to this e-mail or send a mail directly to {1}, to get in touch with {2}

registrationMail.subject: Welcome to Migree
registrationMail.message:
Thank you for your registration, {0}!

We appreciate your initiation and motivation for helping the fellow developers. As a registered member of Migree, we will try our best to match you up with the people who are in need of your help. The match system will ensure that you both share similar expertise and professional background. We encourage you as local developers to initiate chat with the new coming developers, your advices and contacts would be of a great help for the new comers.

(Note*: For now, our developers are working hard to make the match system functions as it should be. Have a few cups of coffee and be patient, it will be online soon. )

Sincerely,
Migree Team

initPasswordResetMail.subject: A password reset is requested
initPasswordResetMail.message:
A password reset has been requested. If you want to reset your password, please use http://migree.se/user/{0}/reset/{1} 

If you havn´t requested a reset, please ignore this message

finishedPasswordResetMail.subject: Your password has been changed
finishedPasswordResetMail.message: Your password has been changed for your Migree login

home.title: Come join us!
home.description: Migree is a unique tool for connecting immigrants with swedes based on their professional skills.
home.loginTitle: Register now and help us make this great

resetPassword.title: Forget password?
